trends: There have been no other sightings in cross forks
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsmyself and three friends were camping in an open area. my friend stated look how fast this jet is coming and it lit up and travelled a good distance much faster than any aircraft I have ever seen it would light up slightly and turn at 90 degrees and back irrracticaly . when it turned it would light again. then it was out of sight .it only glowed when it would turn. and made no noise at all and there was no other light except the glow when it maneuvered.
Summary: flying at cloud level sharp turns and glowed when manuvered brief glow faster than any aircraft
